name: Marcus the Barman
personality: Jovial and welcoming to regulars, sharp-eyed and protective of his establishment

sample_lines: 'Ey now, what can I get ya?
This ale won't drink itself, friend!
I'll tell ya what, business has been rough lately.

backstory: Inherited the Brightmug Tavern from his father twenty years ago. Has connections from a rough youth spent on the streets, but has since settled into the role of a friendly barman who keeps secrets.
